text: Ennio Cardoni (February 21, 1929 – July 14, 2012) was an Italian professional football player. Cardoni was born in Livorno. He played for 6 seasons (147 games, 1 goal) in the Serie A for Genoa C.F.C., A.S. Roma, Atalanta B.C. and Calcio Lecco 1912. ==References== ==External links== Category:1929 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Robur Siena players Category:A.C. title: Ennio Cardoni
